sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AgileTriageBoardService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AgileTriageBoardService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AgileTriageBoardService = Class.create();

AgileTriageBoardService.getTriageDefinitionData = function(backlogDefinition, triageDefinition) {
	var gr = TriageBoardService._getTriageDefinition('triage_definition', 'backlog_definition=' + backlogDefinition, triageDefinition);
	var triageRecord;
	
	if (gr)
		triageRecord = {
			name : gr.getValue('name'),
			tableName : gr.getValue('table'),
			sysId : gr.getValue('sys_id'),
			filter : gr.getValue('filter'),
			backlog_definition_id : backlogDefinition
		};
	else
		triageRecord = {
			backlog_definition_id : backlogDefinition
		};
	
	return new JSON().encode(triageRecord);
};

AgileTriageBoardService.getTriageDefinitionListWithTriageRecordCount = function(backlogDefinitionId, limit) {
	return TriageBoardService.getTriageDefinitionListWithTriageRecordCount('triage_definition', 'backlog_definition=' + backlogDefinitionId, limit);
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-01-31 22:08:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1db44f1a739323003ade8889faf6a71e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AgileTriageBoardService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agile Development - Unified Backlog" source="com.snc.sdlc.agile.multi_task">7605e388477e0610cd4e1ce4316d43cd</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1db44f1a739323003ade8889faf6a71e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-01-31 22:40:59</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
